```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(dplyr)
library(quanteda)
library(quanteda.textmodels)
library(stm)
library(topicmodels)
```

# Pre-process

```{r}
sen_corpus_df <- sen_corpus_df %>%  # or sen_corpus_lemma
  filter(DataPronunciamento >= 2019-01-01)

sen_corpus_df  <- sen_corpus_df %>% 
  rename(Partido = SiglaPartidoParlamentarNaData)

sen_corpus_df <- sen_corpus_df %>% 
  mutate(Partido = str_replace(Partido, "PODE\\b", "PODEMOS"))

```

```{r}
sen_corpus <- corpus(sen_corpus_df, docid_field = "CodigoPronunciamento", 
                     text_field = "PronunciamentoLemma")
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
sen_dfm <- dfm(sen_corpus,
  tolower = TRUE,
  remove_punct = TRUE,
  remove = stopwords("portuguese"),
  remove_numbers = TRUE,
  removeSeparators = TRUE,
  remove_symbols = TRUE,
  stem = FALSE,  groups = c("Nome", "Partido"))


stopwords1 <- c("presidente", "exa", "excelencia", "senhor", "aqui", "porque", "ser",
                "então", "quero", "vai", "ainda", "ter", "pode", "bem", "obrigado",
                "assim", "dessa", "srs", "cada", "portanto", "outro", "toda", "além", 
                "nesse", "nesta", "desta", "deste", "disso", "sra", "pois", "nó", "sr",
                "aí", "senador", "senadores")

sen_dfm <- dfm_remove(sen_dfm, stopwords1)
sen_dfm <- dfm_select(sen_dfm, min_nchar = 2)
docnames(sen_dfm) <- paste(sen_dfm$Nome, sen_dfm$Partido, sep = " ")
```

```{r}
sen_dfm_idf <- dfm_tfidf(sen_dfm)
```

```{r}
textstat_frequency(sen_dfm, force = TRUE)
```


# STM

```{r}
sen_dfm_stm <- asSTMCorpus(sen_dfm)

stm_model <- stm(sen_dfm_stm$documents, sen_dfm_stm$vocab, 10, data = sen_dfm_stm$data, seed = 123)
```

```{r}
words_stm <- as.data.frame(t(labelTopics(stm_model, n = 10)$frex))
words_stm
```
 
```{r}
plot(
  stm_model,
  type = "summary",
  text.cex = 0.5,
  main = "STM topic shares",
  xlab = "Share estimation"
)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
stm::cloud(stm_model,topic = 4, scale = c(2.25, .5))
```

```{r}
plot(stm_model,
     type = "perspectives",
     topics = c(1, 5),
     main = "Putting two different topics in perspective")
```


# Wordfish 

```{r}
mod1 <- textmodel_wordfish(sen_dfm, dir = c(56, 23), sparse = TRUE, seed = 123)
```


```{r}
textplot_scale1d(mod1)
textplot_scale1d(mod1, margin = c("documents", "features"), groups = sen_dfm$Partido)
```


# Keyness

```{r}
textstat_keyness(sen_dfm, "Flavio Bolsonaro PSL")
```


# LDA

```{r}
lda_model <- LDA(sen_dfm, k = 6, control = list(seed = 123))
```


```{r}
topics <- tidy(lda_model, matrix = "beta")

top_terms <- topics %>%
  group_by(topic) %>%
  top_n(10, beta) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange(topic, -beta) %>% 
  arrange(desc(beta))

top_terms
```


```{r}
top_terms_graph <- top_terms %>%
  mutate(term = reorder_within(term, beta, topic)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(term, beta, fill = factor(topic))) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~ topic, scales = "free") +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_x_reordered()

top_terms_graph
